channel.title: System update
channel.description:
Hi,
how do i make a system update?
like players in game see
system update in 5.00 min in yellow to the left.

item.title: System update
item.dc:creator: @KlaidasGuru KlaidasGuru
item.description:
@KlaidasGuru wrote:

U can just do ::update (Time - Secs )

Read full topic

item.title: System update
item.dc:creator: @Killea Killea
item.description:
@Killea wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:4, topic:335641”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=432021.msg3171277#msg3171277 date=1270466476]

if(command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7)) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
[/quote]

Isn’t there things he has to add into PlayerHandler?[/quote]

This worked, maybe i had that already in my playerhandler, thx guys.

Read full topic

item.title: System update
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Oh right, a few more stuff Really cba… just leech it off another source Killea.

Read full topic

@Mitko wrote:

if(command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7)) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

item.title: System update
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Looking into the code, there is a lot you need to add for this simple command. You may just want to look for a tutorial, for me to show you how to add it would just simply me making a tutorial… Which I’d rather not do, lol If you can’t find a tutorial on MoparScape try googleing for one.

Read full topic
